prompt_summary: Craft a React + Tailwind personal site with an artistic, magical, game-inspired tone while keeping the system flexible for future iterations.
key_decisions: Scaffolded a Vite + React + TypeScript stack with Tailwind to stay lightweight and expressive.
Modeled content as lore fragments, constellations, quests, and relics so narrative data can evolve without layout rewrites.
Swapped Vitest for Jest because the environment forbids opening local sockets, ensuring tests can run in CI.
Added bespoke gradients, animated orbs, and modular sections (hero, lore grid, constellations, quest ledger, whisper ticker) to hit the requested mood.
